comments: Preparatory study of the Electronic Tolling Systems (EC-STI, A?lectricitA(C)). New Bridge for the St. Lawrence Corridor Project. This contract includes an amendment of $155,714.00, bringing the total value of the contract to $1,307,418.57. This is a multi-year contract originally awarded by Transport Canada in November 2013, following a competitive process. The contract was later transferred to Infrastructure Canada in 2014, when responsibility for the New Bridge for the St. Lawrence Corridor Project was transferred to Infrastructure Canada.
